error_logs.txt:

# This file will contain all the error logs generated by the discord moderation bot

# Initialize the error_logs list
error_logs = []

# Function to add an error log to the error_logs list
def add_error_log(error_message):
    error_logs.append(error_message)

# Function to retrieve all error logs
def get_error_logs():
    return error_logs

# Function to clear all error logs
def clear_error_logs():
    error_logs.clear()
